ovdesc.p: This screen is used to setup the expected claims account and the expected P&L account for a currency and company code combination.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or delete a record in store table, PPT.CLAIMS

desc.p: Holds 3 character Company Code of expected P&L account number.
Validation Rules:
Defaulted to the value set in field, 'CompanyCode'
Holds 3 character currency code of expected P&L account number.
Validation Rules:
Defaulted to the value set in field, 'CurrencyCode'
Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
Holds Profit and Loss category code.
Validation Rules:
Mandatory field. 4 or 5 numeric characters. The value links to field, 'CATEGORY.CODE' in CATEGORY.
Holds 3 character company code of P&L account number.
Validation Rules:
Defaulted to the value set in field, 'CompanyCode'
Holds 3 character currency code of P&L account number.
Validation Rules:
Defaulted to the value set in field, 'CurrencyCode'
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
Possible values:
N - Not active
A - Active
H - History
F - Future
C - Not active future
Validation Rules:
19 alphanumeric characters.
The value is not editable by the user.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Possible values:
L - Live
U - Unapproved
R - Reversed
Validation Rules:
1 alphanumeric character.
The value is not editable by the user.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
Possible values:
N - New
M - Modified
R - Reverse
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Specifies the date from which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing.
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
Example : BNK,GB1
Validation Rules:
3 alphanumeric characters.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Mandatory input
Holds a unique code which denotes a specific currency used in the payments hub.
Validation Rules
Mandatory field. 3 alphanumeric characters. The value links to field 'CurrencyCode' in PPT.CURRENCY.
Used for internal purpose.Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Specifies the date until which the record is to be considered as active for payments processing. Post this date, the record will be set as Inactive by the payments hub.
Holds the Expected claim account number for a currency and company code combination.
Validation Rules:
Mandatory field. Value should be a valid account number as defined in ACCOUNT.
Holds 3 character company Code of expected claim account number.
Validation Rules:
Defaulted to the value set in field, 'CompanyCode'
Holds 3 character currency code of expected claim account number.
Validation Rules:
Defaulted to the value set in field, 'CurrencyCode'
Holds the Expected P&L account number for a currency and company code combination.
Validation Rules:
The value links to field,'CATEGORY.CODE' in CATEGORY.
